SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services

Klasse EMailServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.services.EMailServiceImpl
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
EMailService
@Component public class EMailServiceImpl extends Object implements EMailService
This Service contains logic and usage for the email service. It provides methods regarding different types of emails.

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    sendAlertMessage(Event event)
    Sends an email to the specified address containing a default or a custom text with a Alert for participating, which can be specified in the mailconfig object of the event.
    void
    sendEventInvitaion(Event event, String emailAddress, String token)
    Sends an email to the specified address containing an invitation link, combined out of the link to the event and a validation token, to the specified event.

    • sendOrganizationInvitation

      public void sendOrganizationInvitation(Organization organization, String emailAddress, String token) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Sends an email to the specified address containing an invitation link, combined out of the link to the event and a validation token, to the specified organization.
      Angegeben von:
      sendOrganizationInvitation in Schnittstelle EMailService
      Parameter:
      organization - the organization where the owner of the email gets invited to
      emailAddress - the email address to send the mail to
      token - the token to validate the invitation link
      Löst aus:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - gets thrown if something goes wrong while sending the mail
